points.name: Washington-Reagan Airport (DCA)
points.notes: Most convenient airport to fly into.

points.name: Washington-Dulles Airport (IAD)
points.notes: Expect a cab to the city to cost $60-80 depending on time of day. Uber is typically cheaper.

points.name: Baltimore-Washington Airport (BWI)
points.notes: A bit of a hike. Can take more than an hour to transit to DC, and could cost you upwards of $60.

points.name: Maderia
points.notes: Blocks of rooms here, great neighborhood

points.name: Other hotel
points.notes: Blocks of rooms here, great neighborhood

points.name: MacIntyres
points.notes: Our favorite bar. We come here for drinks or dinner at least once a week. Carolyn vouches for the burger, while the pulled pork sandwich is Chase's go-to.

points.name: Tail Up Goat
points.notes: Definitely check for reservations weeks in advance, though there are a limited number of walk-ins available each night. They don't seat parties greater than 5, FYI. Definitely get the lamb ribs.

points.name: So's your mom
points.notes: Neighborhood deli for a cheap breakfast or a pastrami on rye. Cash only.
